Text: Online Trading Agreements Cc Jason Peters our litigation manager was unable to meet with Jason during your vacation to discuss consequential damages This is the only material issue outstanding with regard to the Buy Side Direct agreement In addition Jason has been waiting for our position on this issue to be clarified before he continues discussions with Trading Edge Sara we have been aware of the consequential damage issue for more than a month When can we expect this issue to be resolved When can we expect to complete legal discussions with Buy Side Direct and Trading Edge Please call me at or email me at Thanks Mike

Fwd Online Trading Agreements Cc In response to your voice mail message we would like to execute legal agreements for ENA and ECT Investments with Buy Side Direct and Trading Edge Discussions with LIMITrader are on hold given the departure of their point person for legal issues We have been waiting for several weeks for feedback from Doug Ford our LIMITrader sales contact as to how to proceed We expect to resume discussions with MarketAxess when that site is nearer to launching high yield bond trading Paul have you asked Julie Rogoff to notify you when this date approaches My cell phone and email are noted in the email below Sara I understand that our litigation manager has been busy However as noted below the consequential damage issue has been outstanding for more than a month Please let us know when this issue is resolved and when we can expect discussions with Buy Side Direct and Trading Edge to be completed Jason as weve discussed please provide Madhur and Paul an opportunity for a final review before executing when Legal is comfortable with these agreements Thanks Mike Fowler ContentTransferEncoding bit Returnpath From Fullname MFowler MessageID Date Tue Oct EDT Subject Online Trading Agreements To CC MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII XMailer Windows AOL sub Sara per Jason Peters our litigation manager was unable to meet with Jason during your vacation to discuss consequential damages This is the only material issue outstanding with regard to the Buy Side Direct agreement In addition Jason has been waiting for our position on this issue to be clarified before he continues discussions with Trading Edge Sara we have been aware of the consequential damage issue for more than a month When can we expect this issue to be resolved When can we expect to complete legal discussions with Buy Side Direct and Trading Edge Please call me at or email me at Thanks Mike
